name: Painful Traps Master
description:
Painful Traps Master

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #25 "You are the Villain"

You're the traps master, a special type of demon with weak strenght but the ability of placing nasty traps. Don't let the heroes go through the end of the level and pursue their quest. "Cut them all into pieces" as said your boss.

How to play
  • Move with WASD or Arrows Keys.
  • Shoot with the mouse.
  • Select a corresponding trap with 1,2,3,4,5 keys and then place it with a mouse click. You can press <Escape> to cancel.
  • <Space> to start the waves
  • <E> to interact with the teleporter.
  • <R> to Restart.
  • <P> for Pause.
  • <M> to Mute.
Traps Stats

(sorry, I didn't have enough time to include it in the game)

  • <1> Spikes
    • damage : 35
    • cooldown : 5 sec
  • <2> Ice Floor
    • damage : 0
    • cooldown : 4.5 sec
    • slowdown duration : 5 sec
  • <3> Ghost monster
    • damage : 10
    • cooldown : 1 sec
  • <4> Arrow Shooter
    • damage : 15
    • cooldown : 3.5 sec
  • <5> Acid Floor
    • damage : 55
    • cooldown : 8 sec
